definition: dried meat/private teacher's remuneration/withered/variant of 修[xiu1]
to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)

sentences.english: The first is to make basic maths and English compulsory.
sentences.chinese: 第一是将基础数学和英语作为必修课。

sentences.english: Every morning the first thing Cheng does is exercise along the riverbank.
sentences.chinese: 每天早上他的第一项必修课就是沿着河岸做练习。

sentences.english: Since I had 8 pre-requisite classes for med-school, at night I took nursing classes.
sentences.chinese: 我在医学院选过8门必修课程，晚上我去上护理课程。

sentences.english: Animal Biologics Science is a required course for the students of Biologic Technology.
sentences.chinese: 动物生物制品学是生物技术专业的必修课。

sentences.english: Reading was simply a requirement for progressing from kindergarten to first grade.
sentences.chinese: 学会阅读是孩子从幼稚园过渡到一年级的必修课。

sentences.english: Bob and Jenny will study mostly required courses during their first year.
sentences.chinese: 鲍勃和杰妮第一学期主要学习必修课。

sentences.english: Metalworkers ' practice in universities is a required practice course for engineering speciality.
sentences.chinese: 金工实习是高校工科专业的必修性实践课程。

sentences.english: Sketches plan and Drawing techniques courses is compulsory course for students of the city planning major.
sentences.chinese: 效果图表现技法课程为城规专业学生的必修课程。

sentences.english: Trial teaching is a required course which change the role from student to teacher.
sentences.chinese: “试教”是从学生到教师进行角色转换的必修课。

sentences.english: Accounting is an important specialized fundamental course for the non-financial accounting profession compulsory.
sentences.chinese: 会计学是非财会专业必修的重要专业基础课。

sentences.english: In those ancient stores, the needlework is the required course for girls.
sentences.chinese: 在古老故事里，女红是女子的必修课程。

sentences.english: If you fail in compulsory courses, you'll not be granted the graduation diploma.
sentences.chinese: 如果必修课不及格，就不能颁发毕业证书。

sentences.english: This meant creating a tunnel more than one-and-one half kilometers long.
sentences.chinese: 这意味著必修挖掘一条超过500米长的穿山隧道。

sentences.english: Management Information System is a compulsory course for all the students of the Department of Management.
sentences.chinese: 管理信息系统是管理系各专业学生的必修课程。

sentences.english: which is required of all second year Columbia University students.
sentences.chinese: 是哥伦比亚大学所有大二学生的必修课。

sentences.english: It's of great importance to construct Doctor-patient Communication and make it a compulsory course for medical education.
sentences.chinese: 在高等医学教育中开设医患沟通学必修课程意义重大。

definition: (at a school) to take as an elective/an elective/elective (subject)
general course/general education course/core course/general curriculum/general education curriculum/core curriculum
